name: Fluffy Pillow Cat
description:
Fluffy Pillow Cat got its name because I needed insperation for a game and I asked my mom for a game title, she said because she didn't know any thing about the game she couldn't give me a title, because  i didn't make the game yet i told her just to shout one out, as a joke she said fluffy pillow and now that is the name of the game,

Enjoy!

please rate and comment, fallow me on itch!

How to play:

press: Q when next to a fluffy pillow cat to set them free.

use: WASD or the Arrow keys to move.
